answers.answer: I had dibeates as well and I took Castro oil..my baby weighed 8lb 9oz
Try naturally self inducing that's not too healthy
If the doc says it's okay go for it :)

I think there has been a lot of unnecessary conflict on here about this. It's YOUR decision. No one elses. Get feed back from your doctor and do some research. Some other people's opinion might not be what your opinion is. It's your pregnancy and you do what u think.is best. I'm talking to my doctor about it on monday. Good luck!!
And no you're definitely not selfish!
Your doctor said its okay so try it. You're not selfish

question: I am 38 weeks pregnant today. My doctor said I have a very large baby, because I have diabetes with this pregnancy. Do you guys think it would be selfish to take castor oil? I am in constant pain. It may not work, but the doctor said I could try it. I am just ready to meet her and have my body back!
title: Selfish?
